title: Tom Brady, 49ers, LeBron James, NFL draft, & the Clippers
itunes:title: Tom Brady, 49ers, LeBron James, NFL draft, & the Clippers
description:
Colin talks more about the Tom Brady to the 49ers rumor, what Bill Belichick is thinking, why LeBron James is the MVP, what should probably happen during the NFL draft, and why the Clippers are his pick to win the title. Guests include Nick Wright, Peter Schrager, Brad Turner, Stanford Routt

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
